text:
CircleUp - San Francisco + Remote. Hiring Full Stack Engineers + Interns. Visa OK

Want to help tackle a problem that has some impact outside the Silicon Valley bubble? Imagine if all early stage businesses could get funded as easily as tech startups. CircleUp is building a private investment marketplace that helps non-tech consumer & retail businesses raise the capital they need to expand.

Work with a super talented team that values moving fast but also continuous learning & writing code we can be proud of. Jerks / Big Egos need not apply - you will not fit in here. Stack uses Python (Django), AngularJS, and Machine Learning.

Help us build the future of early stage finance! Apply at:

https://circleup.com/jobs/engineer/

More info here:

https://circleup.com/

http://techcrunch.com/2014/03/26/opening-consumer-products-t...
